author: Atomic Shrimp
description:
Here's a rundown of some of the scam ads I have been seeing lately.  A common theme is that these scams often promise refunds; should that reassure you?  (Spoiler: no it should not).

Links to a couple of BigClive's videos about car defrosting scams:
https://youtu.be/ZIp95OaTPcI
https://youtu.be/bZM1thn-ffA

Join the Atomic Shrimp official Discord server for FREE early access to videos! - https://discord.gg/atomicshrimp
Atomic Shrimp subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AtomicShrimp/
title: Scam Awareness - Extraordinary Claims and Promises of Refunds
